title: Fostering Love
description:
Peter Mutabazi survived a harsh childhood on the streets of Uganda because of a stranger’s incredible act of kindness. Now in the U.S., he was ready to pass along that love and change the lives of kids just like him. And along the way, one boy changed his.

Follow Peter on Instagram: @fosterdadflipper

Learn more about Peter’s organization, Now I Am Known

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Make a great thing even better. Go to OMGyes.com/SMILE for a special discount.

Learn more about your dog with Embark. Use promo code SMILE for $50 off!
